field.name: summary
field.value: Using del in ActiveWriter Class Details deletes class from model

field.name: description
field.value: When the designer for AR entities is used and the cursor is within one of the textfields of the "ActiveWriter Class Details" window, using the key "del" to delete on char in the textfield leads to deletion of the current selected class from the model. This behaviour occurs both when the window is floating or docked. There is no difference between classes created manually in the designer and those created automatically by dragging from a server explorer database.
